snippet: Overseas markets were up as expectations grew for more stimulus in China, the world’s second-largest economy.
abstract: Stocks remain mostly flat ahead of first-quarter company reports.
lead_paragraph: Overseas markets were up as expectations grew for more stimulus in China, the world’s second-largest economy.

headline.main: Modest Loss for Market as Investors Await Earnings Reports
headline.print_headline: Modest Loss for Market at Outset of Earnings Season
